about_the_game:
Terminal V is a game about speedsters with a unique control scheme that allows the player to move at insane speeds with full control. Dodge bullets, traverse obstacles, and mow down hordes of enemies with celerity and precision.



Few games have playable speedster characters and in the few that do, the speedsters really aren’t that fast, or the levels are spread out and mostly empty. This makes sense because controlling characters at high speeds is difficult, especially when the player only has control over the velocity of the character (as is the case with almost every game).

However, this game is different.

Terminal V features a character whose position is controlled directly by the mouse. Combat becomes a unique game of striking quickly, finding cover to regain stamina, and striking again. One dash can topple several enemies and a quick follow-up will keep them down.



Features:
  • Innovative mouse controls where the player directly changes the character's position with the mouse
  • Fast-paced combat full of unique situations
  • 20 action-packed levels
  • Multiple playable characters
  • Bonus modes with special conditions to increase the challenge

name: Terminal V

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
